intro: Service quality depends on attention, active listening, empathy and complete and correct records.

p1.title: Active Listening
p1.text: Listen attentively to the customer's report without interrupting. Show that you are paying attention.

p2.title: Complete Inquiry
p2.text: Ask questions to fully understand the situation. Don't assume anything before having all the facts.

p3.title: Cordiality and Empathy
p3.text: Be cordial and empathetic. The quality of this relationship is in your hands.

p4.title: Precise Recording
p4.text: Record all necessary data accurately and completely. This ensures clear service without rework.

box_text: Imagine you're a supervisor analyzing an old complaint case. You find a previous record that only says 'Customer complained'. How does this affect your ability to solve the problem today? Reflect on the impact of details.
